text: @realDonaldTrump We need them to analyze your fake unemployment numbers from Friday, or your fake coronavirus death numbers. Why do you keep calling Hillary Clinton crooked? You got more crooked friends than the mafia. You pardoned more crooks in 31/2 years than the last 8 presidents combined.
